title: Shan Hai Juelun
synopsis:
The emperor of the Central Plains has been missing for several months. Li Mao, a general of the Imperial Guard, and Wei Xian, a court advisor, are secretly dispatched by the Empress Dowager to search for the emperor. Along the way, they encounter Zong Sheng, a martial arts prodigy who turns into a child when he cries; Fan Tian, ​​a teenager with partial amnesia; and Gong Liangzhen, a kind and resilient young Taoist nun suffering from a leg ailment. Their initial encounter is fraught with conflict, yet each harbors their own agenda. The source of all this chaos seems to point to a legendary, mysterious immortal mountain and the secret of eternal life…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
